channel.title: I need to address something regarding Journal posting
channel.description:
# [u]Asking for Journals![/u]
In social deduction games, it's common to be asked for your Journal, or in some games "will" and often times, people will always have one written up and ready to post it for people to read, and share information. Whether it's fake or real, there will usually always be one ready.
# [u]Posting your Journal into the chat is not against the rules![/u]
Maybe in some games, but not here, not in **Throne of Lies.**
If this is something that bothers you or annoys you, keep that to yourself... don't tell people not to do it because of your personal opinion about it. It's something very commonly used in social deduction games and complaining when someone asks for your Journal really won't get you far.
With that being said, you don't need to bring other games in to say "But it's against the rules there" or "It's frowned upon there" because simple fact is, I don't care and neither will anyone else. This is **Throne of Lies.**
So if it annoys you, deal with it!
I will say this, if you're Blue Dragon who gets Imprisoned and the Prince asks you for your Journal and you don't comply, don't get salty about it when you get executed. It's your fault for not playing by the Prince.
I know I speak for a lot of people when I say this. Don't get salty when you're asked for your journal. Comply or die.

item.title: I need to address something regarding Journal posting
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
ThePlex:

Alright, both of you need to stop. You’ve derailed ANOTHER thread.

No one was posting besides me or people replying to me anyway

(i’ll stop don’t yell in my ears…)

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
RopeStringFace:

I don’t argue for the sake of arguing.
“Theft is bad because the person is deprived of a thing and you are anti-deprived of that thing, and in moralistic terms, it is wrong”
Difficult to decipher, but I assume you still dislike theft?

the fuck is this post?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Damafaud:

If you just say,
“Don’t kill me I’m a pretty harmless Princess that somehow know what a wisp is”, I’m pretty sure it will end badly. And dying early is not fun.

It is terrible as unseen/cult to claim princess that will o wisped every night, because 1) those are usually killed on sight and 2) if someone did visit you, and no one received the message, well…

Read full topic

TryphonX:

You gotta have some sort of evidence to back your claim when you’re on trial, you just shouldn’t be on trial without evidence. There is no reason to bring a quote from another thread here.

I was posting that to teach others who agree with me (you should post journal) how to combat someone else’s argument

item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
TryphonX:

That’s from another post… you still need some evidence when someone is on trial, the “fun > wins” is all about how you get up there. You should have a journal ready when you’re up there. Do not try to get my words out of context.

I just said I was playing devil’s advocate.

Also, fun over win could apply here.

I agree with you, as I said in the post above the one where I quoted you

Read full topic
